stimulusHtml:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.


Compare dominant-party or one-party systems in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following:

  1. Define dominant-party system.
  2. Describe two different examples of dominant-party or one-party systems used by different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.
  3. Explain how dominant-party or one-party systems can influence representation for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).
